contributionDescription: I believe my tutorial was the first covering how to use Optimism, connect wallet, bridge to Uniswap & so on. It has been viewed by 10s of 1000s of people on Youtube, Facebook & Twitter. I have also been an ongoing supporter of the Optimism ecosystem & it's projects to this day.

contributionLinks.description: First tutorial on how to use Optimism on Youtube, Twitter & Facebook.

impactDescription: Hopefully this tutorial covering how to use Optimism, connect wallet, bridge to Uniswap & so on has helped many people do so safely, educate them on how to use other projects & protocols in the Optimism ecosystem & helped the growth of users in Optimism in general.
